lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Trouble yourselves no further: pray you, hasten Your generals after.

lines.speaker: agrippa
lines.text: Sir, Mark Antony Will een but kiss Octavia, and well follow.

lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Till I shall see you in your soldiers dress, Which will become you both, farewell.

lines.speaker: mecaenas
lines.text: We shall, As I conceive the journey, be at the Mount Before you, Lepidus.

lines.speaker: lepidus
lines.text: Your way is shorter My purposes do draw me much about: Youll win two days upon me.
